welcome_benefits: 10,000 EDGE Reward Points (Worth ₹2,000) on First Transaction

Movie & Dining: BOGO on Movie Tickets Via District by Zomato App (Up to ₹250, Twice Each Month). ₹200 off on Swiggy Orders (Twice Each Month) and Up to ₹800 Off With EazyDiner on Dining Bills
Rewards Rate: 20 EDGE Points/₹200 on Retail Spends (Until Spending of ₹20,000 Per Month) (~2%). 10 EDGE Points/₹200 After That for All Spends (~1%)
Reward Redemption: EDGE Points are Redeemable for Travel/Shopping Vouchers and More. 1 EDGE Point = ₹0.20
Domestic Lounge Access: 2 Free Visits Each Quarter on Spends of ₹50,000 or More in the Previous 3 Months (Maximum 8 Each Year)
International Lounge Access: 12 Complimentary Visits to International Lounges With Priority Pass
Golf: 6 Golf Rounds Every Year. 6 Additional Golf Rounds on Annual Spends of ₹3 Lakh
Insurance Benefits: Purchase Protection Up to ₹1 Lakh and Travel Insurance

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Renewal Fee Waived on Spends of ₹8 Lakh or More
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% Waiver for Fuel Transactions Between ₹400 and ₹4,000. Maximum Waiver of ₹400 Each Statement Cycle

product_details: Earn 20 EDGE Points/₹200 on spends up to ₹20,000 cumulatively per month on the card and then earn 10 EDGE Points/₹200 spent after that.
Flat ₹500 on a minimum purchase of ₹2,500 on the BigBasket mobile app and website.
Get a flat discount of ₹200 on your Swiggy orders when you make a minimum transaction of ₹1,000.
12 complimentary accesses to international airport lounges annually with a Priority Pass membership.
Bonus EDGE Points on spending ₹3 lakh in an anniversary year.
Renewal fee waiver on spending ₹8 lakh in an anniversary year.
6 complimentary golf rounds every year. Get 6 additional golf rounds on an annual expenditure of ₹3 lakh.
